publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-3920 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees as a revision to the programme of business agreed on 12 February 2003- Wednesday 19 February 2003 after- "2:00 pm Continuation of Stage 3 of Criminal Justice (Scotland) Bill" delete all and insert- "followed by Parliamentary Bureau Motions 6:30 pm Decision Time". Supported by: Euan Robson*
